categories.heading: EXCITING SITE MAKEOVER!
categories.description: Our website just got a fresh new look. We've made buttons easier to use, harmonized colors, and spruced up many pages. Plus, we've given the registration process a makeover. There's a lot more happening behind the scenes too!

categories.heading: MY NAME IS...
categories.description: We've bid farewell to those pesky discriminators. Now, you can choose display names and usernames. Your usernames now take the form of W@username, making it super easy to identify yourself.

categories.heading: PASSKEY MAGIC
categories.description: Guess what? We've introduced passkeys! You can enable them in your ID settings right now. They make logging into your ID a breeze â€“ it's never been this simple! 😄
